name: Crash-o-nauts
description:
My entry for the GMTK game jam 2021, with theme "joined together".

Upon crashing on an alien planet, two astronauts get stuck to each other due to their suits tangling. To escape, they'll need to survive hordes of enemies and to recover the missing pieces of their spaceships, but since they're stuck together, you'll control one of them while the other reloads. 

Controls:

WASD to move
Space to jump
mouse to aim
left click to shoot
use a character to reload the other's weapon

Music by https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
